biotools.summary: The tool functions for analyzing high throughput sequencing stable isotope probing (HTS-SIP) data. Analyses include high resolution stable isotope probing (HR-SIP), multi-window high resolution stable isotope probing (MW-HR-SIP), and quantitative stable isotope probing (q-SIP).

bioschemas.name: HTSSIP
bioschemas.summary: The tool functions for analyzing high throughput sequencing stable isotope probing (HTS-SIP) data. Analyses include high resolution stable isotope probing (HR-SIP), multi-window high resolution stable isotope probing (MW-HR-SIP), and quantitative stable isotope probing (q-SIP).
